channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Siveillance Video Mobile Server V2022 R2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Siveillance Video Mobile Server V2022 R2

item.title: CVE-2022-43400|2024-08-03T13:32:58.062Z -- siemens -- siveillance%20video%20mobile%20server%20v2022%20r2
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Siveillance Video Mobile Server V2022 R2 (All versions < V22.2a (80)). The mobile server component of affected applications improperly handles the log in for Active Directory accounts that are part of Administrators group. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to access the application without a valid account.
